item.title: Web-scraping ODI Cricket World Cup Matches
item.description: Introduction Webscraping Process Introduction World Cup matches are now in action as all initial matches are over, while semi-final and final matches are to come. Sri Lanka is not in the final four, but not at the bottom as well thankfully we ended up in sixth place. It should be noted that not all world cups are the same, earlier it was 60 overs for a team now it is 50 overs.
